mapper.select: select * from bd_user k where k.dr=0 and k.loginname=#{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select info.portcount-(info.counts+1) from ( select count(*) as counts,a.type, case when a.type='1' then b.pc_client when a.type='2' then b.boss_client when a.type='3' THEN b.staff_client else b.device_client end as portcount from bd_user a left join bd_shop b on a.shop_id=b.id where a.shop_id= #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.dr=0 and a.id not in ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) and a.type=#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by a.type,b.pc_client,b.boss_client,b.staff_client,b.device_client) info
